mapping.charge_karma: Recursive interference added by identification / intent (bhaav)
mapping.discharge_karma: Natural unfolding of prior conditions without added loops

computational.L3: Charging phase: additional modeling-of-modeling, rising complexity
computational.L4: Discharge phase: spontaneous, minimal responses; non-interference

notes: Guiding quote p.151: Effortful interference creates asahaj (unnatural state)
Operationalization: detect meta-loops and reduce interference
